casename: Vignes s/o Mourthi and Another v Public Prosecutor and Another Case
coram: Chao Hick Tin JA; Judith Prakash J; Yong Pung How CJ
counsel: Subhas Anandan, Anand Nalachandran (Harry Elias & Partners) for the first Appellant; Mr Lee Teck Leng, Michael Soo Chia (Tan Peng Chin LLC) for the second Appellant; David Chew Siong Tai, Leong Wing Tuck (DPP's) for the Respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Statutory offences/Misuse of Drugs/Trafficking in controlled drugs/Defence of lack of knowledge that substances were drugs/Abetment of trafficking
Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Alibi/Whether defence of alibi should be called at end of Prosecution's case
Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Statements/Whether statement of accused amount to confession/Whether presumption in Misuse of Drugs Act can be relied upon/s 17(2) Evidence Act (Cap 97, 1997 Rev Ed)
